Nuclear_Safety.annual_dose_limit: Workers: 20 mSv/year (max 50 mSv in any single year). Public: 1 mSv/year.
Nuclear_Safety.radiation_zones: Defined by dose rate: Controlled, Supervised, Free zones.
Nuclear_Safety.PPE_requirements: Lead aprons, gloves, eyewear for high radiation areas.
Nuclear_Safety.action_thresholds: Alert at 5 µSv/h, Action at 20 µSv/h.
Nuclear_Safety.alarm_levels: Portable dosimeter alarms set to 5 µSv/h.

Nuclear_Waste.storage_limits: Max 0.5 µSv/h in spent fuel areas.
Nuclear_Waste.transport: Shielded casks, route control, radiation logging.

Inspections_Regulations.protocols: Based on IAEA GS-R-1 & GSR Part 1.
Inspections_Regulations.licensing: Licenses reviewed every 5 years or after modifications.
